trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Shallotte
There were no other sightings in Shallotte on or around October 28th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsWalking out onto my pier, I experienced a glowing meteor that exploded and disintegrated emitting a bright white and green light. It lasted for no more than 1 second. I am on the east coast United States facing the Atlantic ocean. It looked similar to the meteor that was filmed in Russia that actually made landfall. I stood around to see if any other meteors were around and didn't see any after a 10 minute period.
